text: [Hamon] Kasone, ki ʙa nohaq az dijoraşon ronda şudand, [va gunohe nadoştand] çuz in ki meguftand: «Parvardigori mo Alloh taolo ast». Va agar Alloh taolo [zulmu kufri] ʙarxe az mardumro ʙa vasilai ʙarxe digar daf' namekard, savmaaho[-i rohiʙon] va maoʙid [-i masehijon] va iʙodatgohho [-i jahudijon] va masoçide, ki nomi Alloh taolo dar onon ʙisjor ʙurda meşavad, hatman, vajron megardid. Va Alloh taolo kasero, ki [dini] Ūro jorī dihad, jaqinan, jorī mekunad. Be tardid, Alloh taolo qudratmandi şikastnopazir ast
